title: Analisa dependensi antara kewirausahaan, pertumbuhan ekonomi terhadap daya saing
abstract: The purpose of this research is to identify the impact of entrepreneurship (attitude, activity, aspiration) toward competitiveness, the impact of economic growth toward competitiveness, the impact of entrepreneurship toward economic growth, and the impact of entrepreneurship and economic growth toward competitiveness. The research object is 38 state and the data source from Global Entrepreneurship Monitor. Data analysis technique using path analysis. The research showing that entrepreneurship have no direct effect toward competitiveness, but have impact toward competitiveness using economic growth as mediating variable. The economic growth have direct effect on competitiveness.
subjects: ENTREPRENEURSHIP-ECONOMIC ASPECTS; ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT; ENTREPRENEURSHIP; COMPETITION
